function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in ventilation system installations","Impact":"High upfront investment costs","Mitigation":"Cost-benefit analysis before implementation","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation control systems","People":"Hospital administrators, building owners","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Increased focus on indoor air quality","Impact":"Increased demand for air quality monitoring devices","Mitigation":"Efficient use of sensor technology","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, real-time monitoring systems","People":"Healthcare building operators, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Importance of thermal comfort and air exchange","Impact":"Higher demand for HVAC system upgrades","Mitigation":"Energy-efficient HVAC system design and installation","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC control systems, energy-efficient equipment","People":"Healthcare building operators, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management team"}]}
